WorkItem.Description:

"Image added to an ImageList must either derive from Image or be an Icon"

WorkItem.Summary: unhandled exception on edit item tool

Comments.Message: Looks like you got a corrupted file in your images folder. Delete your images folder and it will rebuild itself.
